title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 78 - Civil Penalties And Interest On Underpayments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 78 - Civil Penalties And Interest On Underpayments

State Regulations
§ 78.1 - Failure to file a return or to pay the tax
§ 78.2 - Repealed
§ 78.3 - Failure to pay the tax due to fraud
§ 78.4 - Penalties relating to unstamped or unlawfully stamped packages of cigarettes and unaffixed false, altered or counterfeit cigarette tax stamps, imprints or impressions
§ 78.5 - Interest on underpayments
§ 78.6 - Individuals and entities not subject to civil penalties or interest on underpayments
§ 78.7 - Certificate of the commissioner
§ 78.8 - Criminal penalties, seizures and forfeitures

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 78

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 475, 509[7], 697[a]. 1096 [a], 1142[1], [8], 1250, 1415[a], art. 20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
